SongNotation.Song: Happy Birthday: A A S A F D, A A S A G F, A A K H F D S, I I H F G F
TwinkleTwinkle: A A G G H H G, F F D D S S A
MaryHadALittleLamb: D S A S DDD, SSS, DDD, D S A S D GG, D S A S D SS D S A
Chords: A trid or more notes played together, Here are some basic chords
CMajorChord: A S D (C D E on piano) - Play this together to form a Cmajor Chord
CMinorChord: A E G (C D# G on piano) - Play this together to form a Cminor Chord
C#MajorChord: E F U (C# F G# on piano) - This forms a C#major Chord
C#MinorChor: W D U (C# E G# on piano) - This forms a C#minor Chord
